EndpointSecurityMode.description: The specific security mode to use for the specified endpoint.

EndpointSecurityPolicy.description: The security policy URI to use for the endpoint connection.

UseReverseConnect.description: Use reverse connect to connect ot the endpoint.

OpcAuthenticationMode.description: The authentication mode for connecting to the OPC UA server.

OpcAuthenticationUsername.description: The username or certificate subject name for authentication.

OpcAuthenticationPassword.description: The password for authentication or certificate private key.

DumpConnectionDiagnostics.description: Enables detailed server diagnostics logging for the connection.

RunAssetDiscovery.description: Runs asset discovery on the endpoint.

AssetTypes.description: Finds assets for the selected types.
